long_description: The Haiku Pouch is a grab-and-go bag that keeps life simple. Slip in your iPhone(R), lipstick, cards and cash(TM)and you're off! Really, do you need more?. Haiku Pouch features 6 credit card slots including ID window, 1 bill/receipt pocket and a zippered coin pocket. Phone pocket measures 4.75 x 2.75 in. Includes both a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap and a detachable wrist strap. cyclePET recycled polyethylene is made from 100% post consumer beverage bottles; this textured fabric is durable and soft, yet tough. Nontoxic dyes do not contain carcinogenic materials, heavy metals or formaldehyde.
